comment: Define the function associating with a ring and a set the direct sum indexed by that set of copies of that ring regarded as a left module over itself. Recall from ~ df-dsmm that an element of a direct sum has finitely many nonzero coordinates. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
